blackjack

Class Debug

  • java.lang.Object
    • blackjack.Mode
      • blackjack.Debug

  • public class Debug
extends Mode
    This class extends an abstract class "Mode". Is is used when the program is supposed to get the instructions through a file containing all the instructions. It also receives a file path in order to create his costume shoe.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Pedro Esteves, Ricardo Cristino, Rui Br√°s

    • Constructor Detail

      • Debug

        public Debug(java.lang.String[] args)
        This constructor invokes the super constructor and it gives values to the Strings with the paths for the instructions and shoe files. The paths received must come with the full path after the current path where the jar was ran.
        Parameters:
        args - arguments typed on the command line

    • Method Detail

        returns String with the shoe file path

        public java.lang.String getInstruction()
                                throws java.io.IOException
